content: each color were type a and knit row 2 4 and 6 of each color were type b continue in pattern until blanket is desired size ending on purl row cast off in pattern including yo s and m1 s finishing weave in ends block version 1 0 9/12/2008 this pattern is copyright protected stephanie l castro 09/2008 this pattern is for your personal non-commercial use only you may make as many blankets for yourself for gifts or for charitable organizations as you wish use of this pattern for sale or mass production is not approved you may make hardcopies for your own use you may not distribute it in any hardcopy or electronic format
